QuestData.Title: Upper Blackrock Spire
QuestData.Description: Hellscream's Ironmarch vanguard managed to reach Blackrock Mountain and has allied with Warlord Zaela of the Dragonmaw clan. Even now the Iron Horde readies to invade Azeroth while Zaela prepares a doomsday weapon in the heart of the mountain to ensure nothing stands in their way.$B$BYou must put a stop to Zaela once and for all, commander. She has been a thorn in our side for too long.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Warlord Zaela in Upper Blackrock Spire.
